subject: Attn: Beneficiary,
body:
Attn: Beneficiary,
What is still holding you from sending the required $75 usd as was needed for the delivery of your ATM VISA CARD.Please 
kindly comply and contact Mr. Michael Adams with your delivery Home Address Phone Number and your Full Name
 so that he will Dispatch your parcel and give you the tracking number to monitor the delivery as well,  
Please the only fee you will be advised to send is only the delivery fee which is the sum of $75 usd only
 kindly contact him as soon as you receive this message is urgent,    
Contact Person: Mr. Michael Adams,
Email:  
macltdd100@gmail.com
WhatsApp Number : + 229 -518-677-90
 
We thank you and also remain yours in service.
 
Regards,
Customer-care
Mr.Umha Muhammed,
UBA Bank Group Plc (BR)

subject: Re: Attn: Beneficiary,
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for your message. I'm really excited about the prospect of receiving my ATM VISA. However, I have a few questions before we proceed.

Firstly, could you please explain why there is a delivery fee? Also, how can I be sure that my parcel will arrive safely? Is there any insurance on it?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Donald

subject: Re: Attn: Beneficiary,
body:
*Attention: Beneficiary,With due respect regarding your response as I just
received right now with the content well noted and received in good faith.
Please regarding your response and also your question to this office as I
just received  I want you to know that this fund is a compensation payment
given to all the scam Victims and your email address paper as one once
again kindly understand that the $75 usd is required for the delivery of
your ATM VISA CARD as soon as you comply by forwarding the needed required
delivery information to enable this office register and furnish you with
the Tracking number so that you will monitor the delivery to your home
address and start withdrawal as soon as the delivery Agent arrives your
home address,Your Full Name:Your Address:Your Age:Your Direct Phone
Numbers:Regards,Mr. Michael Adams,*

subject: Re: Attention: Beneficiary,Your urgent response is highly needed,
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for your prompt response. It's quite interesting to hear about this fund payment for victims. I must say, it's a unique concept that I haven't come across before.

Could you please provide more details about how this process works? How was my email address selected and what is the purpose of the ATM VISA CARD?

Also, could you clarify what exactly the USD is required for in terms of delivery? Is it a processing fee or something else?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Donald

subject: Re: Attn: Beneficiary,
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for your response. It's great to hear about this fund for victims. I'm curious, how did my email address come up as one of the victims? 

Also, could you please explain a bit more about this ATM VISA CARD? How does it work and what are the benefits of having one?

I appreciate your help in understanding these matters better.

Best wishes,
Donald
